overview: The rich second-generation Jiang Gongzi and Yuanli and Tianye are friends who hang out together and play in the world. The four of them go to various entertainment venues, go to nightclubs, fight, drink alcohol, and have a wild life. Their lives are extremely empty and decadent. In order to repay the foreign debt, Jiang Gongzi, who was in a tight situation, started a fraudulent idea. With the help of three friends and a beautiful girl, Xiao Ai, they locked one greedy and lustful wealthy businessman after another...
title: Green Tea Girls 2
